mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deal(addr_lv1, addr_lv2, addr_lv3, addr_lv4, bunji, bunji_main, bunji_sub, apt_name, square, deal_year_month, deal_day, price, floor, built_year, addr_road, rel_data, deal_type, dealer_loc) VALUES (#{addr_lv1}, #{addr_lv2}, #{addr_lv3}, #{addr_lv4}, #{bunji}, #{bunji_main}, #{bunji_sub}, #{apt_name}, #{square}, #{deal_year_month}, #{deal_day}, #{price}, #{floor}, #{built_year}, #{addr_road}, #{rel_data}, #{deal_type}, #{dealer_loc});
mapper.select: SELECT id, addr_lv1, addr_lv2, addr_lv3, addr_lv4, bunji, bunji_main, bunji_sub, apt_name, square, deal_year_month, deal_day, price, floor, built_year, addr_road, rel_data, deal_type, dealer_loc FROM deal WHERE id = #{id};

SELECT id, addr_lv1, addr_lv2, addr_lv3, addr_lv4, bunji, bunji_main, bunji_sub, apt_name, square, deal_year_month, deal_day, price, floor, built_year, addr_road, rel_data, deal_type, dealer_loc FROM deal;

SELECT id, addr_lv1, addr_lv2, addr_lv3, addr_lv4, bunji, bunji_main, bunji_sub, apt_name, square, deal_year_month, deal_day, price, floor, built_year, addr_road, rel_data, deal_type, dealer_loc FROM deal WHERE addr_lv1 = #{addr_lv1} AND addr_lv2 = #{addr_lv2} AND addr_lv3 = #{addr_lv3} AND bunji = #{bunji}
SELECT MIN(price) as `minPrice`, MAX(price) as `maxPrice`, COUNT(id) as `count` FROM deal WHERE addr_lv1 = #{addr_lv1} and addr_lv2 = #{addr_lv2} and addr_lv3 = #{addr_lv3} and bunji = #{bunji};
